scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.demo: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run demo -w backend" "npm run demo -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start -w backend" "npm run start -w frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
